page.title: 16Transport,Bromley,S.E.
page.content: Although most families in this area own a car (and indeed many families now have two cars) a lot of people commute to London.In this respect Orpington Station is very important.There is a regular service to Charing Cross and to Victoria.For anyone wishing to cross the Channel,trains run to Dover. Chelsfield Station is a more convenient starting place for people living in Green Street Green.The number of trains actually stopping at Chelsfield has been reduced in recent years. Orpington Station is also a focal point for the bus routes which bring people from the more rural areas.Other bus services connect this region to Bromley and Lewisham. There is considerable discussion at present about the possible privatisation of the bus routes in this area.
